bibl.title: A Latin Manumission Tax Tablet in Los Angeles. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: T. LACMA [Los Angeles County Museum of Art] Inv. M80-202-488. May derive from the Michaelides collection. Payment of the manumission tax (vicesima libertatis). Provenance unknown, late second / third century. - P. 19: improved text of P. Mich. VII, 462.
bibl.seg: VAN MINNEN Peter and Klaas A. WORP, A Latin Manumission Tax Tablet in Los Angeles. Avec résumé en anglais.

T. LACMA [Los Angeles County Museum of Art] Inv. M80-202-488. May derive from the Michaelides collection. Payment of the manumission tax (vicesima libertatis). Provenance unknown, late second / third century. - P. 19: improved text of P. Mich. VII, 462.
